body_html:
I got a similar problem in Jupyter using pytorch 0.2 through pip, but python is 2.7.12.

This is the way I install pytorch

pip install http://download.pytorch.org/whl/cu80/torch-0.2.0.post1-cp27-cp27mu-manylinux1_x86_64.whl
pip install torchvision
body_text:
I got a similar problem in Jupyter using pytorch 0.2 through pip, but python is 2.7.12.
This is the way I install pytorch
pip install http://download.pytorch.org/whl/cu80/torch-0.2.0.post1-cp27-cp27mu-manylinux1_x86_64.whl
pip install torchvision
body:
I got a similar problem in Jupyter using pytorch 0.2 through pip, but python is 2.7.12.

This is the way I install pytorch

```
pip install http://download.pytorch.org/whl/cu80/torch-0.2.0.post1-cp27-cp27mu-manylinux1_x86_64.whl
pip install torchvision
```
